code: import{React,useEffect,useState}from"react";import logo from"../assets/logo1.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NavBar2(_ref){let{theme,toggleTheme}=_ref;const[scrolled,setScrolled]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const offset=window.scrollY;if(offset>0){setScrolled(true);}else{setScrolled(false);}};window.addEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`fixed navbar z-30 bg-base-100 ${scrolled?"border-b-2 border-gray-200":""}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex-1 navbar-start",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{className:"btn btn-ghost lg:text-xl sm:text-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"h-7 w-7 bg-contain  ",src:logo}),"Pugad Maharlika"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-center hidden lg:flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"menu menu-horizontal px-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{id:"home",href:"#",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{id:"discover-nav",href:"#discover",children:"Discover"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{id:"about",href:"#about",children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{id:"team",href:"#team",children:"Team"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-1 gap-3 navbar-end",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleTheme,className:"btn btn-square btn-outline",children:theme==="night"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-regular fa-moon"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-regular fa-sun"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"btn_sign_in_modal",onClick:()=>document.getElementById("sign_in_modal").show(),className:"btn btn-outline",children:"Sign in"})]})]});}export default NavBar2;
